Module org.apache.jena.arq
Package org.apache.jena.sparql.util

Class FmtUtils

java.lang.Object
org.apache.jena.sparql.util.FmtUtils
public class FmtUtils extends Object
Presentation forms of various kinds of objects. Beware that bNodes are abbreviated to _:b0 etc.
See Also:
